about_the_game:
"Whisper of the Curse", This thrilling horror game can be played solo or with a group of up to four people. The game revolves around the members of a cult dedicated to banishing all forms of curses and cursed entities from the face of the Earth since ancient times. Your team has been tasked with breaking the curse and expelling the demonic presence.

In the game, you will feel the tension and fear in locations haunted by cursed entities, and you'll need to perform a series of rituals to unravel the mysterious and terrifying events around you. However, be cautious, as under the influence of the curse, spirits and demonic entities will be lurking to hunt you down. Therefore, you must race against time, as the curse's influence will intensify gradually, making the entities attempting to hunt you more perilous.



Find and Restore: The First Step to Banishing Cursed Entities

As the first step in your quest to banish the cursed entities, you must scour the haunted locations for hidden objects. Once found, carefully place these objects in their rightful positions to unlock progress. Each restored item brings you one step closer to lifting the curse and driving out the malevolent forces that haunt your surroundings.



Charge Crystals to Ignite Flames and Reveal Cursed Items

Commence by charging enigmatic crystals, each imbuing a unique flame. These arcane flames will cast an eerie glow upon the surroundings, unveiling concealed cursed artifacts. The ethereal fires will aid in unveiling the sinister relics that require attention.




Guide the Flame with Your Lantern and Seek Out Cursed Items

Hold the lantern high, letting its eerie flame guide your path through the darkness. As the shadows dance around you, search for the hidden cursed items. The flickering light will reveal the malevolent artifacts that lurk in the depths, waiting to be discovered.



Place Cursed Items at the Ritual Site to Begin Their Destruction

Gather the cursed items and carefully place them at the ritual site. As the ominous energies converge, the dark forces within the artifacts will begin to unravel. This is the first step towards their ultimate destruction, banishing the malevolent presence that haunts your surroundings.



Be Careful: Demonic Entities Will Try to Hunt You

You must always be vigilant, as demonic entities are lurking, waiting to hunt you. At the slightest hint of danger, you must hide immediately. To survive, take refuge in the shadows and disappear into the darkness.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scary elements such as uncertainty and unexpected events, puzzles, supernatural events and hallucinations, spirits-like  entities, mysterious sound effects, dark and eerie environments.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: "Whisper of the Curse" is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game where you and your team will perform various rituals and spells to eliminate the curse and fend off cursed entities. At the same time, you'll need to avoid being hunted by these malevolent entities.
